prompt: Centered, print-ready vector-style artwork: a bold, high-contrast comic illustration and typographic composition on a vibrant hot pink solid background. MUST include a bold black border around both the text and the graphic elements. Isolated artwork only; no garment, no mockup, no fabric, no shadows. TEXT Hungarian: "JELENLEGI ÁLLAPOTOM:" (above) "STABILAN INSTABIL" (below) TEXT English: "THIS IS FINE." (center of illustration). Top headline: large all-caps chunky rounded display type, white fill with subtle distressed texture, heavy black outline and an additional bold black border framing the text block; slight upward arch and tight tracking. Bottom wording: stacked large all-caps condensed display, white fill, matching distressed texture, thick black stroke and its own bold black border, perfectly centered. Center graphic: a framed rectangular comic panel with a thick black frame containing a simplified cartoon dog sitting at a small table surrounded by stylized flat yellow and orange flames, a small coffee mug on the table and a small picture on the wall; speech bubble centered in the panel with the English text in a compact comic sans-style uppercase font, white fill and thin black outline. Overall composition: perfectly centered, balanced hierarchy (headline at top, comic panel center, bold slogan bottom), print-friendly flat colors, heavy black outlines around every element, vector clean edges, screen-print friendly (no photographic detail or gradients), slight tactile halftone or light distressed ink texture allowed for character, maintain readability at various scales.
negative_prompt: mockup, garment, fabric, model, photo, shadows, realistic lighting, background texture, t-shirt mockup, hoodie mockup, garment, fabric texture, wrinkles, folds, shadows, photo, model, background scene, studio lighting
